definitions.title: 1. n.pr.f.
definitions.body: (prob., v. Ew) Ariel (lioness of Ēl) name applied to Jerusalem Is 29:1, Is 29:2, Is 29:2, Is 29:7 (so Ges Ew Che Di al.; Tagum De Brd Or al. say hearth of EĒl, cf. [[אֲרִאֵיל]]).

definitions.title: 2. n.pr.m.
definitions.body: a chief man among returning exiles Ezr 8:16.
[[אֲרִאֵל מוֹאָב]] 2Sa 23:20 = ´[[אֲרִיאֵל מ]] 1Ch 11:26 taken by LXX RV Dr:Sm al. as

definitions.title: n.pr.m.,
definitions.body: rd. two sons of Ariel of Moab; RS:Sem. i. 469 comp. [[אראל]] MI:12, altar-hearth (so Sm & So, and Dr:Sm xci, v. sub [[אֲרִיאֵיל]]) and transl. [[מוֹאָב]] ´[[א]] altar-hearths of Moab.
Ez Eze 43:15 & Qr v:Eze 43:15; v:Eze 43:16 vid. sub [[אֲרִיאֵיל]].
